ALUCON-R.BK.summary: Alucon Public Company Limited produces and distributes aluminum containers primarily in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Can and Tube, and Slug. It offers aluminum collapsible tubes, monobloc aerosol cans, bottles, and rigid wall containers, as well as marker pen bodies. The company also provides aluminum slugs for impact extrusion; and technical impact extrusions, blank aluminum slugs, aluminum coils, aluminum pellets, strips, plates, etc. Its products are used for hair color products, medical creams, adhesives, etc. The company exports its products to approximately 40 countries, including Japan, Australia, the United States, Indonesia, and South Africa. Alucon Public Company Limited was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

VARO-R.BK.summary: Varopakorn Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes semi-finished aluminum products in Thailand, Asia, and Oceania. The company offers a range of products, including automotive and precoated finstocks used for the manufacturing of radiator fins, intercoolers, condensers, and evaporator units in the automotive industry; bare finstocks used to produce screens for heat ventilation in air conditioners; and cap stocks that are used for the fabrication of pilfer-proof caps for energy drinks, electrolyte beverages, liquid medicines, whisky cap, etc. It also provides foils used as raw material in the construction industry; and aluminum sheets and coils, which are used in the manufacturing of various products, such as satellite dishes, traffic signs, plate eyelets, and rolled bonds used in the production of freezers for refrigerators. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
